body.p: Footnotes are especially important in books with a lot of references and annotations. To mark an element as being a footnote, you should use the float: footnote property.
Suppose that you have the following document fragment:
body.codeblock: Changing the oil This should be done by a specialist in a controlled environment in your car.
body.p: To mark the span with the class footnote as an actual one:

There is a counter named footnote that is incremented automatically by the formatting processor each time it encounters an element with float: footnote set on it. Sometimes it makes sense to reset this counter at each of the chapters or sections of the document.

section.title: Styling the Footnote Call
Styling the Footnote Marker
section.p: The footnote marker is the number that is shown at the left side of the footnote text, in the lower part of the page. It has the same text as the footnote call. To style it, you can use the footnote-marker pseudo-element:
